name: Fairies Will
description:
This is an alpha version of my first game. There is still quite a lot of polishing to do, but it should already be enjoyable to play.

Controls

Use direction arrows to move, space to jump, F to attack, and C to dodge. Game controllers are also supported, and are recommended :)

Known issues

  • sound is delayed in the web version. This comes from an issue with Godot HTML exports, it is not clear when it wil be fixed

Credits

  • https://clembod.itch.io/warrior-free-animation-set
  • https://rvros.itch.io/pixel-art-animated-slime
  • https://luizmelo.itch.io/huntress
  • https://astrobob.itch.io/arcane-archer
  • https://szadiart.itch.io/animated-character-pack
  • https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero
  • https://clowddev.itch.io/gardens-forest
  • https://anokolisa.itch.io/basic-140-tiles-grassland-and-mines
  • https://anokolisa.itch.io/high-forest-assets-packd

I hope you will enjoy this game, I would love to hear some feedback, good or bad!
